you running it eithout a stage reduction? The center hole in the ratio stages is 8mm letting just the shaft through but if you are using the base as a 1:1 drive the bolt recess on the nose is bigger and will let the keyway slide out. Some people have had luck with a dab of loctite on the keyway or even resorting to stuffing junk inside the bolt recess hole to keep the keyway from sliding out. I perfer the loctite method or even super glue\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eEdit: I could be not understanding the problem since its 2am and its been a long day\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-03-02T07:17:05.651Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":58,"readers_count":57,"score":21.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":456917,"topic_slug":"neo-maxplanetary-input-coupler-keeps-falling-out","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53198,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"My views are mine and mine alone"},"post_url":"/t/neo-maxplanetary-input-coupler-keeps-falling-out/456917/3","custom_user_title":"My views are mine and mine alone","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3321998,"name":"Franz","username":"pureh2o","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/9de0a6/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-02T07:52:04.587Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eAttach the shaft to the output stage using a 10-32 button head screw.
